Articles.Content:
Personal dome:

One pieace of close and cosy dome straight from the forests of swedens space program. One rover seat that can be used with kas if you like that stuff or seat your kerbals .

The seat uses the awesome but pretty unoticed plugin made by sfr http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24751-0-19-Version-0-02a-sfr-Command-Pod-with-internal-parts-and-crew-visible-adapter. The dude who made seats possible waaaaaaay before those external seats Among other things. Anyways, its buggy so beware

I recomend using http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/28273-0-19-M-M-M-%28Modular-Magnetic-Module%29-0-20 with this, their team makes darn sweet basebuilding parts. You can also use alskaris old but still rocking hollow structures after some cfg tinkering

Old but better pic, the glas is now green and etc

https://www.dropbox.com/s/j2kh8iczezw4ts5/pdome.zip

Bonus

Rocking chair https://www.dropbox.com/s/zdz68btl6283k3r/rockingchair.rar

Iva-cage and further along other suit up stuff:'

Another thing i been playing around for a while is this

It also uses sfrs plugin to make an platform for many many uses, and also buggy haha and can be used along with kas.

Cheers

https://www.dropbox.com/s/unh8u5mf96vig0o/ivasuit.rar

Its buggy betaness but i hope you have fun cheers

I merged the threads so if i mod could remove the old threads that would be kind (Y)

That Looks Great!

But what Bugs have you witnessed?
Cheers=) Hm sometimes kraken visits other then that and textures that needs love its fine so far^^
